DICE Firmware Documentation

Digital Interface Communications Engine

Compiled from DICE Firmware Source Code

Modules

The image below shows the main modules that an application can use. You can click on the modules within the image to view the module information, or click on Modules on the top menu to view a list.

Stack

Error Codes

Most functions in the Firmware return an HRESULT value. The value 0 always indicates successful completion of the function. See ErrorCodes for further information.

Command Prompt Usage

Many of the modules can be tried out from the serial command prompt. See Command Prompt Usage for further information.

Support

To obtain additional support, please visit the TC Applied Tecnologies web site at http://www.tctechnologies.tc Untitled Document
